SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileRank INNER JOIN DLFolder ON (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND (DLFolder.folderId = DLFileRank.folderId) WHERE DLFileRank.userId = ?
SELECT {DLFileRank.*} FROM DLFileRank INNER JOIN DLFolder ON (DLFolder.groupId = ?) AND (DLFolder.folderId = DLFileRank.folderId) WHERE DLFileRank.userId = ? ORDER BY DLFileRank.createDate DESC
